adventure.title: A little about me
adventure.p1: Hi, I’m Daniel, a student of Computer Systems Engineering at the Polytechnic University of Aguascalientes. My passion for programming began in high school, where I discovered the world of code.
adventure.p2: When I’m not programming, you’ll find me enjoying music, always exploring new genres and artists. I also love the freedom of riding my bike, exploring paths, and discovering new places.
adventure.p3: My curiosity and enthusiasm for technology drive me to keep learning and growing in this exciting field. I’m always looking for new challenges and opportunities to innovate!
